fr.graphmaker.gui

Class PopUpGraphe

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPopupMenu
            • fr.graphmaker.gui.PopUpGraphe
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GrapheConstantes, LanguesConstantes, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.MenuElement

    public class PopUpGraphe
extends javax.swing.JPopupMenu
implements GrapheConstantes, LanguesConstantes
    Classe gérant le pop-up qui apparait sur un clic droit de la classe PanelGraphe.
